DOC.detailed_description: Objective : To assess steady state dynamic metabolite change subject type 1 diabetes without microvascular complication understand intrinsic difference non-diabetics metabolite level flux . The hypothesis diabetic complication arise tissue-specific metabolic reprogramming result alteration fuel utilization lead dysfunction tissue . To test hypothesis , use sensitive specific mass spectrometer base metabolomic analysis measure steady state metabolite level plasma urine control subject subject T1DM , without diabetic complication euglycemic hyperglycemic clamp study .
DOC.criteria: Group 1 : T1DM subject without complication : Group 2 : T1DM subject microalbuminuria . Group 3 : T1DM subject advance diabetes complication Group 4 : Ageandsexmatched healthy control subject . General entry criterion : Must type 1 diabetes > 5 year duration . 18 year age old Subjects microalbuminuria group history urinary microalbumin creatinine ration 30300 m/g confirm repeat test nonalbuminuric group value le 30 mg/g . Subjects advanced complication group confirm Retinopathy , Peripheral and/or Autonomic Neuropathy nephropathy . Non diabetic individual match age gender normal glucose tolerance , normal lipid metabolism , normal blood pressure . Age less 18 . Women childbearing potential may pregnant lactate History pancreas , kidney liver transplant History drug alcohol use . History cancer basal cell carcinoma squamous cell skin cancer .
